name: triangulate-image
description: Converts images in to triangular polygons.
author: Georg Fischer <snorpey@gmail.com.com>

scripts.build-browser: npm run browser-es6 && npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run beautify && npm run delete-tmp
scripts.browser-es6: mkdir dist/tmp && babel src --ignore node,index.js --presets es2015 --out-dir dist/tmp
scripts.browserify: browserify -t [ uglifyify --mangle=0 ] --standalone triangulate dist/tmp/browser.js | derequire > dist/tmp/triangulate-image.tmp.js
scripts.clean: rimraf dist dist-node && mkdirp dist dist-node
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
